name: NUI: A Property Oriented Template Engine
short_description: NUI is acronym of "New UI". It is a Property Oriented template engine to build Java-based web UI, developer can define properties' meta data(include type, editor, validator) in Class Template File. See http://newui.sourceforge.net/tutorial/index.html
